HTML Snippets module

Just like the globals module but for HTML procs.

Imports

generator, globals, styles, client

Types

ButtonHref = tuple[text, title, href: string]

Consts

defaultAuthor: string = "Anonym"
Default author, if none is specified 
hrefArticles: ButtonHref = ("Artikel", "Navigiere zu den Artikeln",
                            "articles.html")
hrefChangelog: ButtonHref = ("VerÃ¤nderungen",
                             "Navigiere zu der Seite mit VerÃ¤nderungen",
                             "changelog.html")

                           "contact.html")

                                "contributors.html")

hrefMap: ButtonHref = ("Karte", "Navigiere zur Karte", "map.html")
hrefNewsfeed: ButtonHref = ("Newsfeed", "Navigiere zum Newsfeed",
                            "newsfeed.html")
hrefOfferings: ButtonHref = ("Freizeitangebote",
                             "Navigiere zu den Freizeitangeboten",
                             "offerings.html")
hrefTour: ButtonHref = ("Digitale Tour", "Navigiere zur digitalen Tour",
                        "tour.html")

proc authorBubble(authorName: string;
                  beforeAfterText: array[2, string] = ["", ""];
                  authorDisplayName: string = ""): HtmlElement {.
    ...raises: [KeyError], tags: [], forbids: [].}

Generates an author bubble.

beforeAfterText puts array[0] before the author name and array[1] after the author name

proc isSet[T](item: Option[T]): bool

Shortcut to item.isSome() and checks against value being the same as the initial initialisation

Basically: string == ""; int == 0; seq[T] == @[]; ...
